name: Domestic Collectors
description: Domestic Collectors is a Play-2-earn game on the BNB Smart Chain network which you can sell for real money. Buy, sell and trade your Workers in our open Auction to earn more $DMC made by a highly experienced development team from Scandinavia. We have various seasonal based events with themed workers, for example a halloween inspired worker. We have also put a lot of time and effort to balance the game, the workers and make it more strategic.
